duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and drive the project work plan and supervise project team members to ensure adherence to time, budget, key deliverables, and project milestones.
Provide technical assistance and leadership during the project lifecycle and evaluate, train, and monitor project team members.
Project planning and estimating. Design and adhere to project work plan.
Demonstrate success in gathering team support for ideas or initiatives, or leading a team.
Manage project schedules and budgets to ensure project completion on time, on budget, and within scope and agreed performance metrics.
Understand and advise on best business practices using SAP functionality and manage multiple client-facing and internal projects simultaneously.
Present resolutions for overall project success.
Manage project schedules and budgets to ensure project completion on time, on budget, and within scope and agreed performance metrics.
